content: User revised the description for their work at Pollen Technologies. They implemented a new pipeline structure based on MEDDICC with high automation, utilizing API/webhooks for CRM updates, task reminders, email templates, and notifications for managers on rotting deals. Required appropriate MEDDICC inputs to progress deals to the next stage, reducing sales cycle time by 50%. Developed a 60-day PoV process with streamlined onboarding, enabling a cost-effective trial. Partnerships are set to launch in 2025 due to development constraints.
